pluggable.name: Simple SEO
pluggable.author: Colin Seymour
pluggable.description: Improve your Habari SEO using Simple SEO

help.value: This is a simple SEO plugin. It borrows some ideas from MetaSEO, but without all the complexities MetaSEO provides. Instead it uses the information within your posts and pages to set appropriate SEO, Twitter, Google+ and Facebook friendly headers.
